summary:
Over 10 years of experience leading teams in various facets of design / marketing / technology / web products as Project Manager or Product Manager. Passionate for researching and developing innovative web technologies, I am always working to efficiently meet business needs while striving to understand the team’s ideas. I believe in multidisciplinary teams with the freedom to communicate and generate ideas as a basis for a successful project and I am used to working with Agile development through flexible Scrum practices.

PERSONAL/PROFESSIONAL SKILLS

* Strategic thinking & decision-making.
* Strong leadership, entrepreneurship, collaboration & communication skills.
* Good problem-solving & negotiation skills.
* Flexibility & Creativity.
* Idea generation for innovative web technologies.
* Ability to assemble teams and manage projects across multiple departments/stakeholders.
* Agile methodology and processes framework like Crystal, Scrum, and Kanban.
* Willingness to roll up sleeves and get things done.

Sector: Design.

Cafundó is a creative studio that works with design and technology to deliver innovative digital solutions.
At Cafundó I coordinated teams on web projects (involving mobile, games, apps, entertainment and interaction) and 2D/3D animation projects (animated series, advertisement, product and institutional videos) on various levels of complexity.
Highlights were projects developed for companies such as: Google, Consul (Whirlpool) and Midea-Carrier-Springer (Midea Group). We also participated in projects for Samsung, LG, Bradesco and Greenpeace.

Main responsibilities of my role:
* Meeting facilitation - Client x Team.
* Collaborate with project idea and objectives.
* Define scope, risks, issues, milestones, and deadlines.
* Implement the Lean Start-up Approach and Agile Methodology.
* Inform, involve, and inspire the team.
* Planning, execution, and controlling of multiple projects.
* Prioritize the backlog.
* Full autonomy to make decisions.

In addition to these, I was also responsible for designing, developing, and implementing an internal tool for managing the client's expectations in regards to the projects. With this tool, the client could see the step of the process in which we were in, send messages about that particular part of the project and see snippets of the evolution. This had a large impact, measured by a 90% decrease in customer calls, emails and tickets. Because we were much more efficient with this new format, we were a lot less prone to errors and we had a history of all the actions taken in the tool. This way the clients were also much more assertive when approving or disapproving something about the project. The final impact on the business was the ability to take on 25% more projects without increasing costs.

In this role, I led teams of up to 36 people.", 'title': 'Digital Project Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Freelancer - Web and Graphic Designer', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Freelancer - Web and Graphic Designer', 'description': 'Branding / Interface.
